settings.title: TERRA WIPES TEST
settings.text:
TERRA wipes are made of 100% bamboo as opposed to nasty chemicals. One of the best ways to test if a wipes contain plastic is the burn test* While a plastic-based cloth releases a noxious black smoke of dioxins and polychlorinated biphenyls (BCP) along with other toxic particulates a natural fibre when burnt will mostly release carbon and water mater. By observing the burn test you can easily view the amount of toxic gases released in the burning of just one wipe.

*This test was conducted under controlled conditions and we do not recommend that you try this at yourself.

settings.title: HOW WE TEST NAPPIES
settings.text:
TERRA product development and productions teams literally go the extra mile to source some of the highest quality raw materials from a diverse ZETA Group’s multiple R&D departments and laboratories work closely together to produce the best possible products, whilst our design team can provide assistance with any packaging needs.

At TERRA we pride ourselves on sourcing the best raw materials to meet the needs of every customer whilst at the same time adhering to the highest international quality standards. All products are thoroughly tested and certified by Dermatest at internationally recognised facilities.

Hands on Testing
We tested each diaper in day-to-day normal use over a 3+ month test period and made careful notes on each diaper's performance relative to its competitors. We found hands-on testing observations for absorbency correlated well with our lab test findings.

Leakage
We apply synthetic urine to the nappy four times, recording the amount of liquid, if any, that leaks out of the nappy each time.

Microbiological Test
Signed a commission agreement with a professional testing agency to conduct regular or irregular testing of product formula to see if they are safe and hygienic.
The eco-friendly materials that we use are both natural and certified. Our 3D leak guards protect your baby from leaks and side spills, without using any nasty chemicals.

Our personal care line for babies and their parents is free of parabens, phthalates, mineral oils, PABA and DEA which helps to avoid allergies and toxins.

settings.title: REDUCING ENVIRONMENT IMPACT
settings.text: Our on-going mission is to tread as lightly as we can, trying our utmost to minimize the environmental impact from all of our business processes. At our manufacturing facilities we strive to use renewable energy and we recycle or donate any waste creating doing the manufacturing process.

settings.heading: TRY IT ON YOUR FAVOURITY WIPES TODAY
